titles.title: A bill to establish a critical mineral environmental processing and mining cleanup program, and for other purposes.
A bill to establish a critical mineral environmental processing and mining cleanup program, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary: This bill requires the Department of Energy to award competitive grants for costs associated with environmental assessment, processing, mitigation, and cleanup related to domestically mining and manufacturing certain critical minerals, such as those needed for energy independence.
